text_blocks.content: 1 Instruction No. 18: Count Four: Transportation of a Minor to Engage in Illegal Sexual Activity - The Statute

The relevant statute for Count Four is Title 18, United States Code, Section 2423(a), which provides that a person who “knowingly transports any individual under the age of 18 years in interstate or foreign commerce . . . with intent that such individual engage in . . . any sexual activity for which any person can be charged with a criminal offense,” is guilty of a federal crime.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court filing related to a criminal case involving the transportation of a minor for illegal sexual activity. The text is printed and there are no visible handwritten notes or stamps. The document is paginated and has a header with case information.
